clauses.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: precum şi scopul conformarii cu orice obligatie legala sau decizie a unei autoritati judiciare, autoritati publice sau organ guvernamental

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: Putem dezvalui datele dvs cu caracter personal doar catre operatorul de plati (in prezent Plationline.ro)

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
III. Scopurile și temeiurile de prelucrării

Dacă sunteți vizitator al Website-ului, neurococi.ro prelucrează datele dumneavoastră cu caracter personal astfel:

  • pentru rezolvarea plângerilor, reclamaţiilor şi pentru a monitoriza traficul și a îmbunătăţii experiența dumneavoastră oferită pe Website.

Temei: Prelucrarea datelor dumneavoastră pentru acest scop are la bază interesul legitim al neurococi.ro de a asigura funcționarea corectă a Website-ului, precum și pentru a îmbunătății permanent experiența vizitatorilor Website-ului, inclusiv prin soluționarea diferitelor comentarii, întrebări sau reclamații.

Furnizarea datelor dumneavoastră în acest scop este voluntară. Refuzul furnizării datelor pentru acest scop nu va avea urmări negative pentru dumneavoastră.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Blocking tracking technologies will not negatively impact your use of the service.

case.text: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: Ca principiu, neurococi.ro va prelucra datele dumneavoastră cu caracter personal atât cât este necesar pentru realizarea scopurilor de prelucrare menționate mai sus.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: Also: "dreptul la ștergerea datelor, fără întârzieri nejustificate, („dreptul de a fi uitat”), în cazul in care se aplică unul dintre următoarele motive:[...]"

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: Aceste cookie-uri sunt anonime, stocând informații despre contentul vizualizat, nu și despre utilizatori.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text: <li>dreptul la opoziție – în ceea ce privește activitățile de prelucrare se poate exercita prin transmiterea unei solicitări conform celor indicate mai jos.

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: dreptul la portabilitatea datelor, respectiv (i) dreptul de a primi datele cu caracter personal într-o modalitate structurată, folosită în mod obișnuit și într-un format ușor de citit, precum și (ii) dreptul ca aceste date să fie transmise de către neurococi.ro către alt operator de date, în măsura în care sunt îndeplinite condițiile prevăzute de lege;

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided
clauses.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements (December 2018)
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Dezactivarea și refuzul de a primi cookie-uri pot face această pagină de internet dificil de vizitat, atrăgând după sine limitări ale posibilităților de utilizare ale acesteia.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
